snippet: The awards show, in its 13th year, was broadcast from Las Vegas, where the Latin Grammys have settled congenially into an environment of spectacle and showgirls.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews Latin Grammy Awards, broadcast from Las Vegas, on Univision.
lead_paragraph: The awards show, in its 13th year, was broadcast from Las Vegas, where the Latin Grammys have settled congenially into an environment of spectacle and showgirls.

headline.main: For Latin Grammy Awards, a Giddy and Gaudy Whirl of Styles
headline.print_headline: Latin Grammys: A Whirl of Styles

keywords.value: Latin Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations
